duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist shoppers by answering questions, helping them locate merchandise, and facilitating the check-out process.
Play a fundamental role in the proper and timely merchandising of the store.
Unload and sort merchandise upon delivery arrival, stock and display merchandise in accordance with Company merchandising standards.
Follow all Company safety procedures and work independently with minimal direction and follow the daily to-do list.
Clean up spills, floors, shelves, displays, and perform additional duties as assigned by Management or Supervisors.
